title: What is the Wimbledon tennis schedule?
description: Marcel Granollers and Horacio Zeballos will continue their pursuit of completing the Roland Garros-Wimbledon double on Thursday, when they meet home hopes Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool in the semi-finals. View the day's featured matches below and the full order of play here. Wimbledon

What is the Wimbledon tennis schedule?

Women's singles semi-finals and men's doubles semis take place Thursday

July 09, 2025

AELTC/THOMAS LOVELOCK/POOL/AFP via Getty Images

The Championships, Wimbledon will be held at the All England Club from 30 June - 13 July. By ATP Staff

Marcel Granollers and Horacio Zeballos will continue their pursuit of completing the Roland Garros-Wimbledon double on Thursday, when they meet home hopes Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool in the semi-finals.

View the day's featured matches below and the full order of play here.

Centre Court (starts 1:30 p.m.) 
[1] Aryna Sabalenka vs. [13] Amanda Anisimova (USA)
Belinda Bencic (SUI) vs. [8] Iga Swiatek (POL)
Sem Verbeek/Katerina Siniakova vs. Joe Salisbury/Luisa Stefani

No. 1 Court (starts 1 p.m.)
[1] Marcelo Arevalo/Mate Pavic vs. Rinky Hijikata/David Pel
[4] Marcel Granollers/Horacio Zeballos vs. [5] Julian Cash/Lloyd Glasspool
Alfie Hewett/Gordon Reid vs. Daniel Caverzaschi/Tokito Oda

Read More from Wimbledon:
 Djokovic on 'nasty fall': 'The real impact I will feel tomorrow'
Sinner: I was always going to play, just unsure at what level…
Shelton on Sinner: 'Never seen anything like it'
